    • Constructor Detail

      • Tank

        public Tank(float xCoordinate,
            float yCoordinate,
            int[] colourScheme,
            App app,
            Level levelObj,
            Player player)
        Constructor for Tank object.
        Parameters:
        xCoordinate - is the x-coordinate of a tank, which updates when the LEFT and RIGHT keys are pressed.
        yCoordinate - is the y-coordinate of a tank, which is grounded to the terrain, unless the tank is falling after the terrain below it falls.
        colourScheme - is the colour scheme of the Player object which the Tank object belongs to.
        app - is the App object that we will pass through to allow for drawing + more implementations of the PApplet library.
        levelObj - is the Level object which the Tank object belongs to.
        player - is the Player object which the Tank object belongs to.

      • increaseYCoordinate

        public void increaseYCoordinate(float increase)
        Increases the y-coordinate when the tank is descending, either on a parachute or without a parachute.
        Parameters:
        increase - is the number of pixels we want our y-coordinate to increase by.

      • groundTank

        public void groundTank()
        Keeps the tank on the terrain.

      • drawTank

        public void drawTank()
        Draws the tank. Will draw the shield if it is being hit and has shields left to use.

      • drawTurret

        public void drawTurret()
        Draws the turret and handles its rotation when the UP and DOWN keys are pressed.

      • drawArrow

        public void drawArrow()
        Draws the arrow indicating the player's turn. Disappears after 2 seconds.

      • rotateTurretLeft

        public void rotateTurretLeft()
        Rotates the turret left when the UP arrow is pressed. Call in the keyPressed() function of the App class.

      • rotateTurretRight

        public void rotateTurretRight()
        Rotates the turret right when the DOWN arrow is pressed. Call in the keyPressed() function of the App class.

      • moveTankLeft

        public void moveTankLeft()
        Moves the tank left when the LEFT arrow is pressed by updating the x-coordinate and fuel. Call in the keyPressed() function of the App class.

      • moveTankRight

        public void moveTankRight()
        Moves the tank right when the RIGHT arrow is pressed by updating the x-coordinate and fuel. Call in the keyPressed() function of the App class.

      • setProjectile

        public void setProjectile()
        Creates a new Projectile object each time the spacebar is pressed.

      • insideExplosion

        public boolean insideExplosion(float tankCentreX,
                               float tankCentreY,
                               float explosionCentreX,
                               float explosionCentreY)
        Returns true if another tank is inside the projectile's explosion.
        Parameters:
        tankCentreX - is the x-coordinate of another tank's centre.
        tankCentreY - is the y-coordinate of another tank's centre.
        explosionCentreX - is the x-coordinate of the projectile's explosion centre.
        explosionCentreY - is the y-coordinate of the projectile's explosion centre.
        Returns:
        true if another tank is inside the explosion circle, false if otherwise.

      • damage

        public float damage(float tankCentreX,
                    float tankCentreY,
                    float explosionCentreX,
                    float explosionCentreY)
        Calculates the damange from the explosion. This is proportional to the distance from the explosion.
        Parameters:
        tankCentreX - is the x-coordinate of another tank's centre.
        tankCentreY - is the y-coordinate of another tank's centre.
        explosionCentreX - is the x-coordinate of the projectile's explosion centre.
        explosionCentreY - is the y-coordinate of the projectile's explosion centre.
        Returns:
        30-distance from centre of explosion divided by 30, then multipled by 60; i.e. fraction of damage * 60

      • drawExplosion

        public void drawExplosion()
        Draws explosion of the tank when it dies.

      • expandExplosion

        public void expandExplosion()
        Expands the explosion of the tank as it dies.
